explanations.machine learning: The paper compares the performance of PMBSI models to support vector machines (SVM) and artificial neural networks (ANN), which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions comparing PMBSI models to support vector machines (SVM).
explanations.SVM: This is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is mentioned in the paper.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions comparing PMBSI models to artificial neural networks (ANN).
